wxEcConstMap Struct Reference

It is a wxHashMap(string -> double) which can manage a list of constants. More...

#include <ec_defs.h>

Detailed Description

It is a wxHashMap(string -> double) which can manage a list of constants.

Since version 0.6.1, wxHashMap is the new system used to manage constants. Before, an array of 128 cells was used. New performances have not been probed.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
